2025-04-29.title: UPS Plans 20,000 Job Cuts This Year After Amazon Pullback
2025-04-29.description: United Parcel Service Inc. expects to cut 20,000 jobs this year and close facilities as it dramatically reduces shipments for e-commerce giant Amazon.com Inc.

2025-04-29.title: Amazon says it considered breaking out a tariff charge. The White House called it ‘a hostile action’ | CNN Business
2025-04-29.description: The White House took aggressive aim at Amazon, which confirmed Tuesday it was considering displaying the added cost of President Donald Trump’s tariffs on certain items.

2025-04-29.title: White House hits back at Amazon plan to show tariff price rises
2025-04-29.description: US press secretary Karoline Leavitt calls a reported plan to detail tariff impact on prices a "hostile" political act.

2025-04-29.title: UPS is cutting 20,000 jobs. It’s not what you think | CNN Business
2025-04-29.description: UPS will cut 20,000 jobs this year, about 4% of its global workforce, the company said Tuesday. But UPS added the decision is unrelated to tariffs and is instead due to increased use of technology and a previously announced plan to trim its Amazon business.
